Description.Name: Machine Shop
Description.Details: Maintaining 'Mechs in the Succession War era is complicated by the relative rarity of precision-manufactured parts. The Argo's machine shop, once repaired and brought online, can help address this lack.

AssignedCastDescription: Okay, what we've got here is an empty machine shop, and a whole lot of data on 'Mech specifications. Get me some heavy machining equipment and we'll be machining our own parts, probably better than the ones coming out of the Taurian factories.
